name: api_core_GameObject
description: Base class for all objects that can exist in a scene. Add components to a GameObject to control its appearance and behavior.

properties.name: activeInHierarchy
properties.description: The active state of the GameObject in the Scene hierarchy. True if active, false if inactive. (Read Only)

properties.name: activeSelf
properties.description: The local active state of the GameObject. True if active, false if inactive. (Read Only)

properties.name: isStatic
properties.description: Whether there are any Static Editor Flags set for the GameObject.

properties.name: layer
properties.description: Integer identifying the layer the GameObject is assigned to.

properties.name: scene
properties.description: The Scene that contains the GameObject.

properties.name: sceneCullingMask
properties.description: The Scene culling mask defined for the GameObject. (Read Only)

properties.name: tag
properties.description: The tag assigned to the GameObject.

properties.name: transform
properties.description: The Transform attached to the GameObject (Read Only).

properties.name: transformHandle
properties.description: The TransformHandle of the GameObject (Read Only).
